steps.title: We research how people actually prompt AI
steps.subtitle: step 01
body: We analyse your target audience to identify high-impact topics and benchmark your current AI visibility. This allows us to define which prompts to track, sample, and optimise for—so we focus on the questions that actually influence recommendations and Share of Model (SoM).

steps.title: We design a website structure AI understands
steps.subtitle: step 02
body: Based on the audit, we design the technical and semantic structure AI systems rely on to interpret your brand correctly. Schema.org markup, entity relationships, and content structure—everything needed for accurate understanding and consistent representation. We work closely with your development team to ensure a clean, machine-readable foundation.

steps.title: We implement, test, and deploy the solution
steps.subtitle: step 03
body: Our team implements the required changes—structured data, content optimisation, and knowledge graph integration. We collaborate with your teams or deliver end-to-end. Everything is documented, validated, and tested against real AI model outputs before going live.

steps.title: We measure Selection Rate and improve it over time
steps.subtitle: step 04
body: After launch, we monitor how AI models respond to your optimised presence. Selection Rate, entity accuracy, and recommendation frequency are continuously measured and reported. This isn't a one-off project—your relevance engineering evolves as models, prompts, and AI behaviour change.
